alert.note: Alert for Genesee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:29PM EDT until August 03 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL GENESEE COUNTY... At 429 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Goodrich to near Holly to Fenton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Goodrich around 435 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Atlas, Argentine and Rankin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
